item.description:
Come join us this Friday night at one of Boston's great venues, 33 Lounge! Expect DJs to spin a combination of hip-hop and international house all night in a great atmosphere. A fun place to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

We will meet at 9pm in the LOUNGE bar at STIX Restaurant. STIX is right next to 33, and you should proceed to the STIX Lounge to meet the group. We will head over to 33 around 10:15pm to beat the lines. Please meet us at STIX lounge as you may not find us later. Cover: I do not expect a cover, but be prepared for one in any case.

Please dress appropriately as this is an upscale venue. If traveling by T, Copley Square is the closest T stop on the green line.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at Stixx at 9:00 PM.
item.why: Our meetup group is one of the largest in Boston because people have a great time meeting new people and enjoying the Boston Nightlife! And it is Leap Year Day on Friday - which won't happen again for... A LONG TIME!
item.name: BOSTON NIGHT LIFE GROUP (21 - 35) Meeting
